name: Newton's Quest
description:
This is a non-commercial work produced by PSobrinho GameDev on Unity Engine using the Pixel Frog assets package "Pixel Adventure", sounds from Mikiz's "MEGA MUSIC PACK", available on Itch.io, and songs from the album "Ludum Dare 38 "from Abstraction.

The player character, inspired by the work of "devnewton.fr", was redesigned by the author, as well as the clubs and other UI elements.

All C # programming was produced by the author.

How to Play:

Move = Arrow Keys

Jump = SpaceBar
